caption: Two women embraced tightly, and there were many photos on the wall. One woman leaned against the wall, holding a phone. A girl ran down the street, flooded with memories, including scenes of hugs, performances, and graduations. A group of graduates sat at a table, wearing their graduation gowns. A woman with an umbrella talked on the phone with a man following behind. Two men were engaged in conversation. Several women were sitting indoors, chatting, and shortly after, another woman entered the room. A woman arrived at a luxuriously decorated house and spoke to several servants.
